title: RISTEK x GDP Labs Webinar
description: A tech workshop exclusively for students  brought and designed by GDP Labs, one of Indonesia’s biggest software-centric companies.

title: RISTEK x Stripe Interview Workshop
description: The first-ever collaboration between Stripe Asia Pacific and Indonesia through RISTEK x Stripe Workshop: a 2 days interview session designed for students by Stripe engineers

title: RISTEK x Educare Bootcamp
description: A month-long tech and career intensive workshop for the faculty students, a collaboration with BEM Fasilkom UI and SISTEM Fasilkom UI.

title: RISTEK @ Compfest Startup Academy
description: RISTEK Keynote speaker about the future of students role in tech held at COMPFEST, Indonesia’s biggest student-held Tech Festivals.

title: RISTEK Sync: Into the Product Verse
description: An internal townhall for ristek members to showcase and explore the next frontier of products from each division.
